title: The PPR Securities Act Notice Information Schema. Only used when the registration type is SE.

securitiesActNoticeType.description: Required, specifies the type of Securities Act Notice: lien, preservation order, or order of proceedings.

effectiveDateTime.description: Optional, the timestamp the registration is effective. The default is the PPR system generated createDateTime. The format is ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD.

description.description: A note explaining the purpose of the registration.

noticeId.description: The unique identifier generated by the system for the notice record. Returned in the API responses to maintain Amendment registration changes to Securities Act Notices.
